chunk:
BLDG Active Skin Repair Hydrating Serum

Brand: BLDG Active

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Ammonium Acryloydimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, C13-15 Alkane, Ceramide NP, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Gluconolactone, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Benzoate, Polyglyceryl-

zoate, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Sucrose Stearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid

Directions: Use Active Skin Repair Hydrating Serum to help moisturize skin and promote skin barrier function. Apply daily o

ction. Apply daily on the body, face or areas where increased hydration is needed. May be used alone or following application of Active Skin Repair Spray or Hydrogel.

Warnings: For external use only. Do not use on open skin or wounds. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.
